definition: a motor vehicle with four wheels, make by machinery
details:
noun
- a motor vehicle with four wheels
= synonyms: car
- any mechanical or electrical device that transmits or modifies energy to perform or assist in the performance of human tasks
- a device for overcoming resistance at one point by applying force at some other point
= synonyms: simple machine
- a group that controls the activities of a political party
= example: a group that controls the activities of a political party
= synonyms: political machine
- an intricate organization that accomplishes its goals efficiently
= example: an intricate organization that accomplishes its goals efficiently
- an efficient person
= example: an efficient person
verb
- make by machinery
- turn, shape, mold, or otherwise finish by machinery
